DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Compare overall disease free survival patient completely resect stage II III colon cancer randomize adjuvant chemotherapy bolus fluorouracil leucovorin calcium levamisole vs continuous infusion fluorouracil levamisole . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord center , T stage ( T1 vs T2 v T3 v T4a ) , N stage ( N0 vs N1 v N2-3 ) , time surgery registration ( 21-28 v 29-35 day ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive leucovorin calcium IV immediately follow fluorouracil IV day 1 5 week 1 , 5 , 9 , 14 , 19 , 24 , oral levamisole 3 time day 3 day day 1-3 . Courses repeat every 2 week 6 month . Arm II : Patients receive levamisole arm I plus fluorouracil continuous IV infusion 8 week . Treatment fluorouracil repeat every 10 week 3 course . Treatment continue absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow 9 month 12 month , every 6 month 4 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 1,500 patient accrue study approximately 5.5 year .
